title: Did Michia Johnson accuse the Republic of Frederika Wilson of using her husband as a political platform?
subtitle: The Facebook article is alleged by the widow for a controversial condolence call "published" at least an hour before President Donald Trump contacted her.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: ==History==The widow of the golden star, Maicia Johnson, criticized Rep. Freederica Wilson on Facebook for distorting the content of a condolence call from President Donald Trump.
